price: Kwa yakini aliona katika Ishara kubwa kabisa za Mola wake Mlezi.
arabic: لَقَدۡ رَأَىٰ مِنۡ ءَايَٰتِ رَبِّهِ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰٓ
footnotes: Hakika ameona mengi katika Ishara za Mwenyezi Mungu na maajabu yake makubwa makubwa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: laqad raā min āyāti rabbihi al-kub'rā
